alert.note: Alert for Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 12 at 3:27AM PST until December 13 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 4 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest, Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast and Northern Salinas Valley/Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 4 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast
